joehung302 wrote:
> Have anyone seen this error before?

Tell us more about the circumstance Joe?  By any chance, is this crawl 
based on a checkpoint recovery and perhaps you switched Heritrix 
versions subsequently?  (While, the Heritrix class versions haven't 
changed recently, the bdbje lib was recently updated).
>
> I used to have a very stable configuration that I can run for at
> least a couple weeks but now I'm testing out the new configuration
> (2 dual-core AMDs with 2.6.9 kernel and 32bit java 1.5.0_06 server
> VM).
What changed Joe?  The hw and the kernel?  Any chance of reverting to 
your hardwon stable-config?

St.Ack
>
> I hit another hotspot error the other day for (maybe) completely
> different reasons. I still have a few things to try but want to know
> if anybody is having problem running sizable crawls on 1.5.0_06 and
> 2.6.9 kernel.
>
> cheers,
> -joe
>
> Here are more detail. Email me if you want mroe info.
>
